text: The 1928 New Mexico A&M; Aggies football team was an American football team that represented New Mexico College of Agriculture and Mechanical Arts (now known as New Mexico State University) during the 1928 college football season. In their second year under head coach Ted Coffman, the Aggies compiled a 4–5 record and shut out three opponents. The team played its home games on Miller Field, sometimes also referred to as College Field.2018 Media Guide, p. 15. ==Schedule== ==References== New Mexico AandM Category:New Mexico State Aggies football seasons New Mexico AandM Aggies football
title: 1928 New Mexico A&M Aggies football team
